utilities

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.EventDispatcher

  • public class EventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Dispatcher for the events Stores the listener objects and notifies them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EventListenerCollection globalListeners
      Stores global listeners, that handle all events
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,EventDispatcher> instances
      Stores all instances that previously have been created
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,EventListenerCollection> listeners
      Stores all listeners
      private EventQueue queue
      Queue that stores the triggered events so they still can be propagated to event listeners that are registered at a later time

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private EventDispatcher()
      Constructor is private.
